attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To much of our beautiful countryside is being destroyed by building! British orchards are being grubbed and transformed into housing estates. This affects both our wildlife, our     carbon emissions and traffic. A perfect example of this is a meadow close to me. A meadow, homed to mice, hedgehogs and butterflies destroyed to make a modern estate. Again adding     to traffic. Now we have to eat New Zealand apples that have travelled halfway across the globe. Because they are cheaper because they are easier to find. We urge you, action must be taken soon or England will loose it's beauty that it is famous for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
